channel.title: How do I fix a moparscape compiler!?
channel.description:
I have jdk 6.0 and jdk 6u6.
And I know a lot of people have this issue.
So I read that if you download JDK 6 you can put in your variables 1.6.0_06 so i did that and it still doesnt work! What do I do!? :mad:

item.title: How do I fix a moparscape compiler!?

for all your compiler questions, go to

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,349078.0.html

item.title: How do I fix a moparscape compiler!?
item.dc:creator: @co_pked co pked
item.description:
@co_pked wrote:

i think you should update your jdk to
6u13 better for you when you get
Right Click Compiler then copy and paste this

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: How do I fix a moparscape compiler!?
item.dc:creator: @arrie123 arrie123
item.description:
@arrie123 wrote:

go to ur compile right click then click on edit delte evertthing in the box and add this into it this compile works

@echo off
:menu
title Chosen angels compiler
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo Welcome to chosen angels compiler, thankyou for using me.
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors
echo You need a } for every {
echo Errors will show up if any below the line.
echo ________________________________________________________________________________
echo Errors:
echo ________________________________________________________________________________
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

hope that help --Trinity–

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix a moparscape compiler!?
